segments.text: I'm looking closely at the woman near the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so absorbed in her task, polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh my, the sink is absolutely overflowing with water!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is running from the faucet and just pouring over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a big, widening puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is actually right in the middle of that puddle!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice something like that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains completely neutral, as if nothing is amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of unawareness is truly astonishing to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the water damage this will cause.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone could easily slip and fall on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a disaster waiting to happen right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water keeps coming, relentless and unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR
